pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with German Chancellor Angela Merkel | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with German Chancellor Angela Merkel to congratulate her on her September 23, 2017, election victory.â€Ž

Prime Minister Trudeau expressed his pleasure that Chancellor Merkel will continue to champion the values that the two leaders share, and both looked forward to their continued work together on the world stage.
